article.title: Efficiency of Information Service at a Research Institute (findings of aquestionnaire survey)
article.author: Zyabrev, V.A.
article.text: Discussing the problem of evaluation of the efficiency of an information service at a research institute, the paper presents the results of a questionnaire survey conducted in 1968 at an electronics industry research establishment; the objective of the survey was to work out improvements of the special information system..
